reviews.review: life ruining experience 10/10
GG

Nope, not with this new update. If you like playing as the killer, this is your time, till whenever they hit DBD with a newer update. It is nearly impossible to win as a solo queue player. They said that they will bring balanced update to prevent tunneling and camping. Well, they didn't, they made it worse. I've run into killers that just basically made generator progress impossible, without a very coordinated team. I'm not high MMR, but, low to mid, and a solo queue, good luck with this update. As for me, I will be uninstalling, till I can play solo queue survivor again. New update for me 37/43 games, that I've lost since the new update as a survivor. The wins, were from playing as killer, but I am not a killer main, but I still won, because it was actually really easier playing as killer, then it was before. Till we meet again DBD, good bye for now.
its good
好玩皮臉一直玩

Generally, It's a good game i enjoy playing it but there are some negative sides of the game. 

Pros : 
1. Fun 
2. There can be a lot of funny moments 
3. Playing with friends / Finding people to play with on a regular basis.
4. Everything is cheap, Good Price for any cosmetic.
5. Rewarding from playing.

Cons Of Survivors 
1. AFK's.
2. Rage quitting or DC.
3. People who run around the map instead doing objectives.
4. Instead healing somebody people tend to run around.
5. People who don't speak English
6. People who bait the killer to you when you are doing an objective.
7. No Voice Coms
8. Charms do nothing just a standard cosmetic.
9. Toxic players who send death threats to the killers at the end.

Cons of Killers : 
1. Killers enjoy tunnelling and camping you too much.
2. Cosmetics make you more visible and chased for the killer.
3. Killers who will face camp you if you loop them good or flashlight them or do objectives.
4. Killers will not let the last person win or escape even if they did everything while their team was either afk or was trolling.
5. Toxic killers who send death threats to the survivors at the end of the game.

Final result : 
Sounds of the game : 6/10
Quality & Graphics : 9/10 
Gameplay : 6/10 - Survivors / 7/10 - Killer
Videos & Trailers - 10/10

Total - 7.5/10 = I'll still play it but need changes to the game reguards to the community.

Games take too long now, I'm talking about games that last at least 30 minutes because killers won't give chase and just gen camp with regression perks. I honestly rather have camping or tunneling killers so the game can at least progress and end faster but it seems to be the new killer meta. Anyway, expect most games to be either one or the other.

Comecei a jogar ano passado. Até então não conhecia o jogo e quando comecei a ver alguns vídeos, fiquei com um pé atrás, mas resolvi dar uma chance. E vou ser sincero, é um jogo muuuuuito divertido, tanto para quem joga solo ou para quem joga com os amigos. 

Tem muitos personagens, dos dois lados (sobreviventes e killers), o jogo é bem dinâmico e possuí aquele sistema de perks, onde você monta a sua build. Recentemente, o jogo passou por uma atualização onde teve mudanças DRÁSTICAS de gameplay e diversas modificações em perks, mudando o meta do jogo e deixando o jogo mais balanceado (ou tentando, né).  

Isso é bom, porque todo jogo online e com anos de mercado, tem que se reinventar, até pra não ficar monótono. A comunidade ainda está se adaptando as novas mudanças (e pode ser que venham mais, de acordo com o feedback dos players). 

Enfim, recomendo. É um jogo viciante, principalmente se jogar com os amigos (mas solo vc se diverte muito também, vai por mim) e que tem muito potencial ainda, seja com a chegada de novos personagens, seja com as mudanças, etc. Acredito que seja o melhor do gênero. Ahhh, e sempre jogue com os dois lados, pra sua diversão ser ainda mais completa. 

Se possível, pegue numa promoção (o jogo direto fica com desconto, e as DLC's também). Aproveite e diverta-se!

高中时的德怀特是一个精通计算机的死宅·他一心想成为学校里最酷的孩子之一,可他??没有那种魅力·他试着加入了足球队却被踢了出去﹐篮球队更是压根没考虑过他﹐他的学习成绩也明显低于平均分。
在一次公司周末活动中﹐他的老板在八卦他的家事之前把他们带进了森林深处·第二天醒来时德怀特发现自己孤身一人，只记得自己喝了一口酒
原来他在夜里被大家抛弃在了树林里·作为圈内笑柄的德怀特又一次被迫独自寻找走出森林的路·但那次活动是大家最后一次见到德怀特·费菲尔德了。

Well it all started in late 2018 when a friend recommended the game for me saying its fun where you play as survivor or killer you either being chased or you're the one doing the chasing, I was like yea that sounds fun I'll get it ( That friend is no longer my friend jk xd), We started playing the game and indeed it was fun, But what was good was the ppls we met along the way some were just randoms we met during the trial and some become real friends, It was all good playing dbd and having fun whenever we have time to do it until the devs started making their own changes to the game regardless of the community critics and recommendations, They started messing around with everything from animations to the core of the game were it makes the game fun to play for both sides, But we endured just for the sake of having some fun with friends while playing this game until again they released the latest update when they screwed everything and I think for real this time. So to answer the question 'Do I recommend this game ?' The answer is no maybe yes in 2018 or 2019 or maybe in the future but its a NO for now, Consider this a warning  letter for you the new comer to this community but still THE CHOICE IS YOURS.
Peace out

強パークがDLCキャラに多く追加で買わないと弱い感じがある。一応、聖堂が何とかしてくれるが一週間ごとのランダム性があり、いつ来るかも分からないため、ある程度継続しなければならない。弱いパークでマッチし、シャードやBPなどのゲーム内通貨を集めるのが苦だという方にはオススメ出来ない。

With the new update, the game feels more balanced than ever and they reduced the grinding you have to go through in order to play with the current meta perks (or the ones you like). That said, you still need to grind considerably and a lot of content is not included in the normal edition of the game.

Buy it, but consider that the learning curve for this game is considably high, so you have to put a high amount of hours into it and that the game will never be truly balanced because it's an asymmetrical game so you'll have nerve wrecking experiences every now and then. Better with friends.

EDIT: The new update brought a lot of bugs with it, what a surprise.

Etant très fan des films d'horreur de type "slasher", je ne peux que aimer ce jeu qui m'offre la possibilité d'incarner mes tueurs favoris du cinéma. J'ai passé beaucoup de temps sur ce jeu à jouer aussi bien du côté tueur que du côté survivant, et je dois dire que je m'en lasse pas. De plus, avec l'arrivé de nouveaux personnages et les objectifs à faire pour compléter les archives, cela donne un énième intérêt à continuer à jouer. 
Enfin, les développeurs font tout pour corriger des abus, régler des failles et proposer du contenu, et pour cela un grand merci à eux !

game kill good sometimes when alright

If you want a scary game with some friend adventure while facing different killers this would be your game. Dead by daylight is a 4 survivor and 1 killer escape game where the 4 survivors are to repair 5 generators across the different maps while escaping the killer. Trying to hit you on the run after the killer has you down your not done yet you can still recover yourself and wait for a team member to come to your rescue. Once a survivor is doing a generator or healing a team member there skill checks where you need to time the shot. The killer has 2 hits and your down, but some killers have abilities to one tap you. There are hooks around the map that the killer will try to hang you 3 times till your out and dead. If your team members don't help you in time it can go to 2 times then 1. 

The graphics in this game are incredible and I recommend this game to you

DBD is a mixed relationship type game. One minute you want to kill yourself and the next minute you are having the time of your life. If you want to play killer good luck because survivors nowadays just drop a pallet down and then run to the next one. For the first chase the survivor will drop 7 pallets before you get a hit off. For survivor unless you are inna survive with friends just dont play because its not fun at all. But at the end of the day you will probably come back to the game over and over again. So Highly recommend.
